action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image depicts a snowy landscape with a group of people engaged in winter sports activities. There are individuals skiing and snowboarding down a slope. The attire of the participants is appropriate for cold weather and winter sports, with bright colors standing out against the white snow. The sky is overcast, and the visibility is clear, allowing for a broad view of the scene. The terrain is marked with ski tracks, indicating the path taken by the skiers and snowboarders.

The terrain is covered with snow, and there are visible ski tracks. The mountain range in the background is partially covered with snow, and the weather appears to be sunny and favorable for outdoor activities. The time seems to be during the day, given the bright sunlight and shadows cast on the snow.
